title: How to Set Up Your Computer for the First Time

steps.title: First, purchase a Desktop PC from companies such as Dell and PC World.
steps.content: First, purchase a Desktop PC from companies such as Dell and PC World. Make sure that the PC does what you want it to do.

steps.title: Next, open the box to find the components purchased with the desktop (monitor, mouse, keyboard).
steps.content: Next, open the box to find the components purchased with the desktop (monitor, mouse, keyboard).

steps.title: After that, place the desktop where you think it should go (near or on a desk is good).
steps.content: After that, place the desktop where you think it should go (near or on a desk is good).

steps.title: Now, connect the cables.
steps.content: Now, connect the cables. You should have a VGA or DVI cable for the monitor, a 3.5 mm cable for the speakers, A PS/2 or USB cable for the keyboard and mouse and a power cable.

steps.title: After that, connect everything to an extension cable and connect that to an AC outlet.
steps.content: After that, connect everything to an extension cable and connect that to an AC outlet.
